name: Outer Reaches
description:
Interactive space simulator promo for death metal band Rude, based on the "Outer Reaches" album artwork and featuring the title track.

Original artwork by Jan Buragay - Instagram

Developed by Jason Gluck - Instagram, Twitter

Music by Rude - Instagram, Facebook, Bandcamp

"Outer Reaches" available from:

Headsplit Records (USA, cassette only)

Dawnbreed Records (EU, cassette, vinyl coming soon)

Caligari Records (USA, vinyl coming soon)
